Articles.Content: FINALLY DID IT, I made it to the mun and back. I know that I have posted something similar. But this is different, last time I pancaked into the dark side of the mun during the return. So this is a big accomplishment.

Welcome to the KSP forums! Have fun, and enjoy your stay.

Miauw!

Cat\'n witeken

PS: Why does everyone sign his post like Capt\'n Skunky...?

PS: Why does everyone sign his post like Capt\'n Skunky...?

Because they have no imagination or originality.

And Rocket, why did you post this in Welcome Aboard? You\'ve been here a while already and I\'m almost positive you\'ve posted in here before.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
how did you do it iv made at least 200 tries and failed

how did you do it iv made at least 200 tries and failed

There are a few ways. I suspect that something like Kosmo-not\'s video tutorial would be the best way to explain.
